description1: The Box is a responsive PWA shopping list developed using Vue.js, Vuex, Vuetify, and VueI18n technologies.
caution1: This website will be relocated to enable users to fully utilize its PWA capabilities.
description2: This project is a website designed for professors and teachers to easily record and manage student attendance. Initially developed using React and Node.js, it has now been rewritten using Next.js.
description3: Silicon Box is a dummy and basic responsive E-Commerce website and developed by Next.js and TypeScript.
hint: This section will be completed soon!
